verses.verse: וְלִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Now the sons יִשָׂשכָ֗ר <S%H3485><s%> of Issachar תּוֹלָ֧ע <S%H8439><s%> [were] Tola וּפוּאָ֛ה <S%H6312><s%> and Puah [יָשִׁיב כ] (יָשׁ֥וּב <S%H3437><s%> Jashub ק) וְשִׁמְר֖וֹן <S%H8110><s%> and Shimron אַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <S%H702><s%> four ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons תוֹלָ֗ע <S%H8439><s%> of Tola עֻזִּ֡י <S%H5813><s%> Uzzi וּרְפָיָ֡ה <S%H7509><s%> and Rephaiah וִֽ֠ירִיאֵל <S%H3400><s%> and Jeriel וְיַחְמַ֨י <S%H3181><s%> and Jahmai וְיִבְשָׂ֜ם <S%H3005><s%> and Jibsam וּשְׁמוּאֵ֗ל <S%H8050><s%> and Shemuel רָאשִׁ֤ים <S%H7218><s%> heads לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> house אֲבוֹתָם֙ <S%H1><s%> of their father's לְתוֹלָ֔ע <S%H8439><s%> [to wit] of Tola גִּבּ֥וֹרֵי <S%H1368><s%> [they were] valiant men חַ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> of might לְתֹלְדוֹתָ֑ם <S%H8435><s%> in their generations מִסְפָּרָם֙ <S%H4557><s%> whose number בִּימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> [was] in the days דָוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> of David עֶשְׂרִֽים־ <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וּשְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> two אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> and six מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred ס

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons עֻזִּ֖י <S%H5813><s%> of Uzzi יִֽזְרַֽחְיָ֑ה <S%H3156><s%> Izrahiah וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and the sons יִֽזְרַֽחְיָ֗ה <S%H3156><s%> of Izrahiah מִֽיכָאֵ֡ל <S%H4317><s%> Michael וְ֠עֹבַדְיָה <S%H5662><s%> and Obadiah וְיוֹאֵ֧ל <S%H3100><s%> and Joel יִשִּׁיָּ֛ה <S%H3449><s%> Ishiah חֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H2568><s%> five רָאשִׁ֥ים <S%H7218><s%> all of them chief men כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

וַעֲלֵיהֶ֨ם <S%H5921><s%> by לְתֹלְדוֹתָ֜ם <S%H8435><s%> And with them by their generations לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> after the house אֲבוֹתָ֗ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers גְּדוּדֵי֙ <S%H1416><s%> [were] bands צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> of soldiers מִלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> for war שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty וְשִׁשָּׁ֖ה <S%H8337><s%> six אָ֑לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִרְבּ֥וּ <S%H7235><s%> [men] for they had many נָשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> wives וּבָנִֽים׃ <S%H1121><s%> and sons

וַאֲחֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H251><s%> And their brethren לְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all מִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת <S%H4940><s%> among all the families יִשָׂשכָ֔ר <S%H3485><s%> of Issachar גִּבּוֹרֵ֖י <S%H1368><s%> [were] valiant חֲיָלִ֑ים <S%H2428><s%> men of might שְׁמוֹנִ֤ים <S%H8084><s%> fourscore וְשִׁבְעָה֙ <S%H7651><s%> and seven אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand הִתְיַחְשָׂ֖ם <S%H3187><s%> reckoned in all by their genealogies לַכֹּֽל׃ <S%H3605><s%> all manner פ
בִּנְיָמִ֗ן <S%H1144><s%> [The sons] of Benjamin בֶּ֧לַע <S%H1106><s%> Bela וָבֶ֛כֶר <S%H1071><s%> and Becher וִידִֽיעֲאֵ֖ל <S%H3043><s%> and Jediael שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> three

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons בֶ֗לַע <S%H1106><s%> of Bela אֶצְבּ֡וֹן <S%H675><s%> Ezbon וְעֻזִּ֡י <S%H5813><s%> and Uzzi וְ֠עֻזִּיאֵל <S%H5816><s%> and Uzziel וִירִימ֨וֹת <S%H3406><s%> and Jerimoth וְעִירִ֜י <S%H5901><s%> and Iri חֲמִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H2568><s%> five רָאשֵׁי֙ <S%H7218><s%> heads בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house אָב֔וֹת <S%H1><s%> of [their] fathers גִּבּוֹרֵ֖י <S%H1368><s%> mighty חֲיָלִ֑ים <S%H2428><s%> men of valour וְהִתְיַחְשָׂ֗ם <S%H3187><s%> and were reckoned by their genealogies עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וּשְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8147><s%> and two אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <S%H702><s%> and four ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons בֶ֗כֶר <S%H1071><s%> of Becher זְמִירָ֡ה <S%H2160><s%> Zemira וְיוֹעָ֡שׁ <S%H3135><s%> and Joash וֶ֠אֱלִיעֶזֶר <S%H461><s%> and Eliezer וְאֶלְיוֹעֵינַ֤י <S%H454><s%> and Elioenai וְעָמְרִי֙ <S%H6018><s%> and Omri וִירֵמ֣וֹת <S%H3406><s%> and Jerimoth וַאֲבִיָּ֔ה <S%H29><s%> and Abiah וַעֲנָת֖וֹת <S%H6068><s%> and Anathoth וְעָלָ֑מֶת <S%H5964><s%> and Alameth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> All these [are] the sons בָֽכֶר׃ <S%H1071><s%> of Becher

וְהִתְיַחְשָׂ֣ם <S%H3187><s%> And the number לְתֹלְדוֹתָ֗ם <S%H8435><s%> of them after their genealogy by their generations רָאשֵׁי֙ <S%H7218><s%> heads בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house אֲבוֹתָ֔ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers גִּבּוֹרֵ֖י <S%H1368><s%> mighty men חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> of valour עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> [was] twenty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וּמָאתָֽיִם׃ <S%H3967><s%> and two hundred ס

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> The sons יְדִיעֲאֵ֖ל <S%H3043><s%> also of Jediael בִּלְהָ֑ן <S%H1092><s%> Bilhan וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and the sons בִלְהָ֗ן <S%H1092><s%> of Bilhan [יְעִישׁ כ] (יְע֡וּשׁ <S%H3266><s%> Jehush ק) וּ֠בִנְיָמִן <S%H1144><s%> and Benjamin וְאֵה֤וּד <S%H164><s%> and Ehud וּֽכְנַעֲנָה֙ <S%H3668><s%> and Chenaanah וְזֵיתָ֔ן <S%H2133><s%> and Zethan וְתַרְשִׁ֖ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> and Tharshish וַאֲחִישָֽׁחַר׃ <S%H300><s%> and Ahishahar

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֵ֜לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> All these the sons יְדִֽיעֲאֵל֙ <S%H3043><s%> of Jediael לְרָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> by the heads הָאָב֔וֹת <S%H1><s%> of their fathers גִּבּוֹרֵ֖י <S%H1368><s%> mighty חֲיָלִ֑ים <S%H2428><s%> men of valour שִׁבְעָֽה־ <S%H7651><s%> seven עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> teen אֶ֙לֶף֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand וּמָאתַ֔יִם <S%H3967><s%> and two hundred יֹצְאֵ֥י <S%H3318><s%> [soldiers] fit to go out צָבָ֖א <S%H6635><s%> for war לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> [and] battle

וְשֻׁפִּ֤ם <S%H8206><s%> Shuppim וְחֻפִּם֙ <S%H2650><s%> also and Huppim בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children עִ֔יר <S%H5893><s%> of Ir חֻשִׁ֖ם <S%H2366><s%> [and] Hushim בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons אַחֵֽר׃ <S%H313><s%> of Aher

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons נַפְתָּלִ֗י <S%H5321><s%> of Naphtali יַחֲצִיאֵ֧ל <S%H3185><s%> Jahziel וְגוּנִ֛י <S%H1476><s%> and Guni וְיֵ֥צֶר <S%H3337><s%> and Jezer וְשַׁלּ֖וּם <S%H7967><s%> and Shallum בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons בִלְהָֽה׃ <S%H1090><s%> of Bilhah פ

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh אַשְׂרִיאֵ֖ל <S%H844><s%> Ashriel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom יָלָ֑דָה <S%H3205><s%> whom she bare פִּֽילַגְשׁוֹ֙ <S%H6370><s%> ([but] his concubine הָֽאֲרַמִּיָּ֔ה <S%H761><s%> the Aramitess יָלְדָ֕ה <S%H3205><s%> bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מָכִ֖יר <S%H4353><s%> Machir אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> the father גִלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead

וּמָכִ֞יר <S%H4353><s%> And Machir לָקַ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> took אִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> to wife לְחֻפִּ֣ים <S%H2650><s%> [the sister] of Huppim וּלְשֻׁפִּ֔ים <S%H8206><s%> and Shuppim וְשֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> name אֲחֹתוֹ֙ <S%H269><s%> whose sister's מַעֲכָ֔ה <S%H4601><s%> was Maacah וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> and the name הַשֵּׁנִ֖י <S%H8145><s%> of the second צְלָפְחָ֑ד <S%H6765><s%> [was] Zelophehad וַתִּהְיֶ֥נָה <S%H1961><s%> had לִצְלָפְחָ֖ד <S%H6765><s%> and Zelophehad בָּנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> had daughters

וַתֵּ֨לֶד <S%H3205><s%> bare מַעֲכָ֤ה <S%H4601><s%> And Maachah אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> the wife מָכִיר֙ <S%H4353><s%> of Machir בֵּ֔ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וַתִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> and she called שְׁמוֹ֙ <S%H8034><s%> his name פֶּ֔רֶשׁ <S%H6570><s%> Peresh וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> and the name אָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> of his brother שָׁ֑רֶשׁ <S%H8329><s%> [was] Sheresh וּבָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons אוּלָ֥ם <S%H198><s%> [were] Ulam וָרָֽקֶם׃ <S%H7552><s%> and Rakem

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons אוּלָ֖ם <S%H198><s%> of Ulam בְּדָ֑ן <S%H917><s%> Bedan אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> These [were] the sons גִלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מָכִ֖יר <S%H4353><s%> of Machir בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh

וַאֲחֹת֖וֹ <S%H269><s%> And his sister הַמֹּלֶ֑כֶת <S%H4447><s%> Hammoleketh יָלְדָה֙ <S%H3205><s%> bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִישְׁה֔וֹד <S%H379><s%> Ishod וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִיעֶ֖זֶר <S%H44><s%> and Abiezer וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַחְלָֽה׃ <S%H4244><s%> and Mahalah

וַיִּהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons שְׁמִידָ֑ע <S%H8061><s%> of Shemida אַחְיָ֣ן <S%H291><s%> were Ahian וָשֶׁ֔כֶם <S%H7928><s%> and Shechem וְלִקְחִ֖י <S%H3949><s%> and Likhi וַאֲנִיעָֽם׃ <S%H593><s%> and Aniam פ

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim שׁוּתָ֑לַח <S%H7803><s%> Shuthelah וּבֶ֤רֶד <S%H1260><s%> and Bered בְּנוֹ֙ <S%H1121><s%> his son וְתַ֣חַת <S%H8480><s%> and Tahath בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וְאֶלְעָדָ֥ה <S%H497><s%> and Eladah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וְתַ֥חַת <S%H8480><s%> and Tahath בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son

וְזָבָ֥ד <S%H2066><s%> And Zabad בְּנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וְשׁוּתֶ֥לַח <S%H7803><s%> and Shuthelah בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וְעֵ֣זֶר <S%H5827><s%> and Ezer וְאֶלְעָ֑ד <S%H496><s%> and Elead וַהֲרָג֗וּם <S%H2026><s%> slew אַנְשֵׁי־ <S%H582><s%> whom the men גַת֙ <S%H1661><s%> of Gath הַנּוֹלָדִ֣ים <S%H3205><s%> [that were] born בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in [that] land כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because יָרְד֔וּ <S%H3381><s%> because they came down לָקַ֖חַת <S%H3947><s%> to take away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִקְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4735><s%> their cattle

וַיִּתְאַבֵּ֛ל <S%H56><s%> mourned אֶפְרַ֥יִם <S%H669><s%> And Ephraim אֲבִיהֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> their father יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> days רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> many וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> came אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren לְנַחֲמֽוֹ׃ <S%H5162><s%> to comfort

וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> And when he went in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> to his wife וַתַּ֖הַר <S%H2029><s%> she conceived וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and bare בֵּ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> and he called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמוֹ֙ <S%H8034><s%> his name בְּרִיעָ֔ה <S%H1283><s%> Beriah כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because בְרָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> because it went evil הָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> had come בְּבֵיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> with his house

וּבִתּ֣וֹ <S%H1323><s%> (And his daughter שֶׁאֱרָ֔ה <S%H7609><s%> [was] Sherah וַתִּ֧בֶן <S%H1129><s%> who built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּית־ חוֹר֛וֹן <S%H1032><s%> Bethhoron הַתַּחְתּ֖וֹן <S%H8481><s%> the nether וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֶלְי֑וֹן <S%H5945><s%> and the upper וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אֻזֵּ֥ן שֶׁאֱרָֽה׃ <S%H242><s%> Uzzen-sheerah

וְרֶ֣פַח <S%H7506><s%> And Rephah בְּנ֗וֹ <S%H1121><s%> [was] his son וְרֶ֧שֶׁף <S%H7566><s%> also Resheph וְתֶ֛לַח <S%H8520><s%> and Telah בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וְתַ֥חַן <S%H8465><s%> and Tahan בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son
לַעְדָּ֥ן <S%H3936><s%> Laadan בְּנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son עַמִּיה֥וּד <S%H5989><s%> Ammihud בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son אֱלִישָׁמָ֥ע <S%H476><s%> Elishama בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son
נ֥וֹן <S%H5126><s%> Non בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son יְהוֹשֻׁ֥עַ <S%H3091><s%> Jehoshua בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son
